title: Ed Miliband – 2021 Comments on Post Office Scandal
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Ed Miliband, the Shadow Business Secretary, on 23 April 2021.
content:
This is a huge victory in the fight for justice for the subpostmasters affected by this appalling decades-long scandal, in the face of inaction from government.
